entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
